gloss: (biology) the process of an individual organism growing organically; a purely biological unfolding of events involved in an organism changing gradually from a simple to a more complex level / (genetics) the organic process whereby the DNA sequence in a gene is copied into mRNA; the process whereby a base sequence of messenger RNA is synthesized on a template of complementary DNA / a judgment by a higher court that the judgment of a lower court was incorrect and should be set aside / a judgment disposing of the matter without a trial / accord by verdict / declare the loser / defeat by a majority of votes / organic process consisting of the division of the cytoplasm of a cell following karyokinesis bringing about the separation into two daughter cells / reach, make, or come to a decision about something / the act of deciding to do something / the act of making up your mind about something / the decision of a court on issues of fact or law
(law) the determination by a court of competent jurisdiction on matters submitted to it / a judgment disposing of the matter without a trial / decreed by or proceeding from a court of justice
